articles.description: Not all of Tata's offerings have received discounts this month; but those that have, have received substantial ones     Save up to Rs 20,000 if you go for the Tiago or Tigor.     No discounts for the petrol variants of the Nexon.     The Harrier is offered wi…
articles.content:
• Save up to Rs 20,000 if you go for the Tiago or Tigor. 
  • No discounts for the petrol variants of the Nexon. 
  • The Harrier is offered with benefits of up to Rs 45,000.

articles.title: Has India’s central bank avoided tackling high inflation? - Al Jazeera English
articles.description: As the RBI focuses on managing Indian government’s debt & propping up growth, inflation soars.
